articles.description: Infrared scans indicate that the phrase, "Can only have been painted by a madman", matches the artist’s handwriting
articles.content: A small inscription scribbled in pencil in the top left hand-corner of Munchs The Scream (1893) was made by the man himself, says a Norwegian scholar who has reassessed the celebrated painting. Mai B… [+3358 chars]
